situation.title: Visit to a church/synagogue/moque
situation.meta_description: Rules and recommendations for individual visits

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Individual visits to churches for prayer are allowed, but the situation varies from church to church. Most parishes have established websites where you can find out under what conditions you can visit the church. The same goes for synagogues and mosques.

It is obligatory to wear a face mask in inside - also follow hygienic measures (do not touch your face, wash your hands etc.).
